name: Z-NOX® 20
description: Z-NOX® 20 functions as a hindered phenolic antioxidant for thermoplastic polymer processing. Its appearance ranges from white to grainy powder. Its role involves countering polymer degradation during long-term aging and preventing discoloration at high temperatures. The product's compatibility spans a wide range of polymers and is accompanied by low volatility.
